name: Toymageddon
description:
Overview

You are a figurine who has been abandoned by her owner when they moved, leaving the house abandoned. The house was scheduled for demolition, so you must fight your way through hordes of pests to escape the house before it is destroyed with you in it.

Controls

  • WASD to move.
  • Left mouse button to shoot

Rules

  • You must find the exit without dying or running out of time
  • Walk over a microphone to pick it up, changing your attack
  • Walk over bottles of super glue to restore a portion of your health
  • Defeating one of the large boss enemies will reward you with extra time
  • Getting hit will trigger a very brief window of invulnerability
  • Your score at the end of the game will be based on how many enemies you killed and how much remaining time you have

Tips

  • Sometimes it may be worth taking a hit to get yourself into an advantageous position
  • With a multi-shot attack, you may be able to hit an enemy with multiple hits if you’re close enough, but put yourself at risk doing so.
  • All enemies cause damage when you touch them
